DOC.brief_summary: To determine bioequivalence of pediatric appropriate 80 mg atorvastatin formulation comparing to the 80 mg commercial atorvastatin calcium tablet formulation.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Of Pediatric Appropriate Formulation
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female volunteers Mass Index (BMI) of approximately 18 to 30 kg/m2 Any condition possibly affecting drug absorption A positive urine drug screening
